title: Verification of Reemployment Assistance Benefit Eligibility
subject: labor

abstracts.abstract: Verification of Reemployment Assistance Benefit Eligibility;  Citing this act as the “Promoting Work, Deterring Fraud Act of 2026”; revising circumstances under which the Department of Commerce disqualifies claimants from reemployment assistance benefits; requiring the department to verify claimants’ identities before paying benefits; providing duties of the department, etc.
